Subject: How to do partition
Description: Previously, we had a 128 GB SSD in Azure, which has now been upgraded to 512 GB. However, the additional space has not been automatically allocated in the endpoint protector portal.
What_We_Know__c: 2025.04.16: The customer extended the Hard Disk size from 128 GB to 512 GB in Azure, a backend procedure was needed in order to extend the root partition for the EPP appliance.
Next_Steps__c:
2025.04.15:
We have a remote session scheduled for 2025.04.16. In our remote session we will extend the EPP appliance root partition via SSH in the backend.

2025.04.16: 
Customer confirmed that the storage space is now visible in the user interface and confirmed that we may proceed to close the ticket.
